lead_paragraph: DONLEAVY--Thomas Joseph "T.J.," died peacefully in his sleep on January 6, 2016. Committed to his own inner vision he was a poet, sculptor and composer. T.J. approached life with vigor, compassion and dedication. His late niece Marita O'Hare, along with her son B. Patrick Brown, were dedicated to bringing his art to the public through exhibitions, a website and a soon to be published book: "Life as Art: The Works of T.J. Donleavy" by Nancy Malloy. Mr. Donleavy studied at the Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts and The Barnes Foundation. Mr. Donleavy is survived by his son David Zwanetz Jr.; grandsons Michael and David; brother, Author J.P. Donleavy, Ireland, ("Ginger Man"); nephew, Producer Phillip Donleavy; niece, Ceramic Artist Karen Donleavy; sister, Professor Emerita Mary Rita Donleavy, Lehman College, CUNY, grandnephew, B. Patrick Brown, Scarsdale, NY. 1/3
